code.display: PhenX - alcohol - lifetime abuse and dependence protocol 030501

code.display: At what age did you begin to drink regularly; that is, drinking at least once a month for 6 months or more?

code.display: Have you ever started drinking at times you promised yourself that you wouldn't, or have you ever drunk more than you intended? For example, when you decided to drink 2 drinks and ended up drinking 4 or more?

code.display: Health prob long drinking SSAGA II

valueCoding.display: Memory problems even when you weren't drinking

code.display: Alcohol use problems SSAGA II

item.text: Alcohol use problems SSAGA II
There are several health problems that can result from long stretches of drinking.

code.display: Specify other physical health problems from drinking

item.text: Specify other physical health problems from drinking

valueCoding.display: Heart beat fast or did you sweat
See or hear things that weren't there

code.display: Did you continue to drink knowing that drinking caused you to have health problems?

item.text: Did you continue to drink knowing that drinking caused you to have health problems?

item.text: Emot psych problem re drinking SSAGA II

valueCoding.display: Feeling depressed or uninterested in things
Feeling jumpy or easily startled or nervous
Feeling paranoid or suspicious of people
Hearing, seeing, or smelling things that weren't really there

code.display: Did you continue to drink after you knew it caused you any of these problems?

item.text: Did you continue to drink after you knew it caused you any of these problems?

code.display: Alcohol withdraw problems SSAGA II

item.text: Alcohol withdraw problems SSAGA II
People who cut down, stop, or go without drinking after drinking steadily for some time may not feel well. These feelings are more intense and can last longer than the usual hangover.

code.display: Alc withdraw problem type SSAGA II

item.text: Alc withdraw problem type SSAGA II

valueCoding.display: Heart beat fast or did you sweat
See or hear things that weren't there

code.display: Was there ever a time when two or more of these problems occurred together?

code.display: Was there ever a time when two or more of these problems occurred together? Which ones?

item.text: Was there ever a time when two or more of these problems occurred together? Which ones?

valueCoding.display: Heart beat fast or did you sweat
See or hear things that weren't there

item.text: Which ones - Code in COL. 2 (NO=1, YES=5, DK/REF) IF 2+ SYMPTOMS in COL. 2, MARK TALLY SHEET A. NOTE QUESTIONS 3 AND 4 ARE NOT PART OF DSM-IV CRITERIA

code.display: Have you ever taken a drink to keep from having any of these problems (or to make them go away)

item.text: Have you ever taken a drink to keep from having any of these problems (or to make them go away)
